song.title: Remote control
song.info:
Comment
Prism and Edge of Unexpected present:
Remote Control
finished in December '93
This is our contribution to The Party 3
PC music compo. Too bad there aren't
separate 4- and multichannel compos,
for this was originally a 4-ch. .MOD...
This song shouldn't be played with MM
because StarScream decided to create
his own standards for volslides, BPM's,
portamentos and other effects.
Some greets.....:
Purple Motion & Skaven /FC, Sonic PC
members, Turtle/Accession & Trixter
Many thanks to PSi / FC for letting us
use his module player in the compo!
